channel.title: Guizhou on 个人博客

item.title: Guizhou Travel |A Paradise for Hikers and a Journey into Ethnic Diversity|Independent Travel
item.description: Guizhou Province has long been known for its “ethnic charm,” but few have truly ventured deep into southeastern Guizhou. Most people may recognize “Xijiang Qianhu Miao Village,” a highly renowned village. While Xijiang is indeed an impressive village, the over-commercialization of this tourist spot has somewhat diminished its former tranquility. Today, let’s delve into Liping, Congjiang, and Rongjiang, to explore this colorful land and experience its true primitive and mysterious charm.
